#Text= Sokka says : " Great job with the cloud camo , but next time , let 's disguise ourselves as the kind of cloud that knows how to keep its mouth shut .

column1: #Text=" Toph says : " Yeah , we would n't want a bird to hear us chatting up there and turn us in .
#Text=" Sokka says : " Hey , we 're in enemy territory .
#Text=" Sokka says : " Well , this is it .
#Text=This is how we 'll be living until the invasion begins .
#Text=Hiding in cave after cave after cave after cave ... " Katara says : " Sokka , we do n't need to become cave people .
#Text=What we need is some new clothes .
#Text=" Aang says : " Yeah , blending in is better than hiding out .
#Text=If we get Fire Nation disguises , we would be just as safe as we would be hiding in a cave .
#Text=" Toph says : " Plus , they have real food out there .
#Text=Does anyone want to sit in the dirt and eat cave hoppers ?
#Text=" Sokka says : " Looks like we got outvoted , sport .
